personality.title: Shady Guard
personality.look: This guard looks more than a little disgruntled. If you can keep her ire directed at her boss, that might be a great advantage.
personality.name: "Who even cares? If you must, call me G."
personality.job: "Guarding this vault. But one good heist could pay me off better than the wages, that's for sure."
personality.unknown: "Just leave the planning to me, okay?"

personality.title: Tired Guard
personality.look: This guard looks tired of doing his job, but also too tired to defy his boss.
personality.name: "Like I'm telling you that, intruder!"

personality.title: G
personality.look: It's your old pal G, the conniving guard. "Looks like we're stuck at a dead end, hm?"
personality.name: "It's just G."
personality.job: "My job now is to get the two of us out of here with the treasure! But I'm afraid we're stuck."

node.text: "So you want in, huh?" She smirks. "Well the next door will require more sophistication than the one you busted down like an impatient troll. I have the tools you need, but they'll cost you."
"So, the guard in the hallway is giving you trouble, huh? I have an idea for that."
"He's supposed to patrol between two lookout points. He gets lazy sometimes, but if you ask him about patrol duty, he has to do it! That's when you slip past."
"Blast! You're right. I've been slacking off. Now move along so I can do my job."
Every once in a while, this guard will now switch locations. You can wait for a turn by clicking your main character, or typing '5' on the number pad.
"Well, I'll be honest. I know the way out, but you're not going anywhere without giving me the gold you found in the vault."

Technically, there is another option. You could start combat mode with 'f' and move to attack. Attacking friendly characters can be a very bad idea, but this is a role-playing game, so it's up to you. (This guard doesn't seem so tough.)
"Your cooperation is much appreciated. So long, suckers!"|Well, you managed to keep at least a chunk of the gold secret, so that's nice.
You don't have enough gold. Did you loot the chest in the vault room?
